02:06:56.674 [crypto] retrieveEnrollmentData -> ERRO 01d [client.DVLA] Failed getting enrollment certificate [id=DVLA]: [rpc error: code = 2 desc = "Identity lookup error: sql: no rows in result set"]

ok
